what_you_do: Andrea Isaacs is the CEO and founder of the Emotion and Life Mastery Institute, renowned for her pioneering work in emotional mastery.
social_proof: She has been empowering entrepreneurs and leaders to reach their potential for 30 years and has brought her unique method to 30 countries on five different continents.
business_focus: Helping entrepreneurs and leaders reach their potential through emotional mastery and personal growth.
